law.catch_line: PAINTING STREETS, CURBS, ETC.; AUTHORIZED CITY EMPLOYEES.

structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS

section.text: It shall be unlawful for any person other than duly authorized employees of the City to paint the streets, sidewalks or curbs, or any part thereof, within the right-of-way of any street or public alley within the City. (Code 1959 , §19-11.1)
